Latest News

  1. 2019 Special Town Meeting - April 9, 2019

    The Select Board set Tuesday, April 9th, 2019 as the start date for two Special Town Meetings. Town Meeting is held in the Brookline High School Auditorium, 115 Greenough Street Read on...

  2. 9th Brookline Youth Awards

    The 9th Brookline Youth Awards will be at the Coolidge on April 10 at 7. Read on...

  3. March 19, 2019 Select Board Votes to Place Debt Exclusion Question on Ballot

    At their meeting on March 12, 2019, the Select Board voted to place the following Proposition 2½ debt exclusion question on the Annual Town Election ballot for May 7, 2019. Read on...
